text: Rialuth Serge Vohor (23 April 1955 â€“ 22 November 2024) was a Vanuatuan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Vanuatu five times during his political career from 1995 until 2011. Until 2022, he was a member of the Union of Moderate Parties. Vohor died in Jaipur, India on 22 November 2024 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Vanuatu
title: Serge Vohor
